name: Moevenpick Hotel & Apartments Bur Dubai

reviews.text: Very nice place to stay. Customer service is wonderful. Ramesh Chinna, Thank you for your help and for taking so much pride in your work. This hotel has a very relaxing atmosphere. Thank you to the whole staff.
reviews.title: My Favorite!

reviews.text: I have been staying in this hotel for the past 10 days and I could not be more pleased with the professionalism of the staff and particularly the house keeping service. I would like to thank house keeper, Viju, who has been very friendly and helpful. Because of his house keeping skills and hard work maintaining my room, I decided to extend my stay at this hotel for few more days. I come to Dubai on business trips and thanks to Mr. Fabian, the sales manager at this hotel, I received attractive corporate rates. I found peace of mind in this hotel, it is like "home away from home". Thank you. Sam (Room #274)
reviews.title: House Keeping
Ivy
reviews.text: Beautiful hotel, friendly staff, very clean. The pool is very refreshing after a day out shopping ! :) Winwin looked after me very well at breakfast ! I would definitely stay here again :) ........................................

after coming here to my room from doing some things,my room was taken care of with pride,someone who cares what he does and accepts his work to be nothing less than impeccable, as someone like myself that appreciates quality work and into detail he done a above a job duty detail,hius name is Vijunesamany- Housekeeping dept-thankyou
reviews.title: Very professional and with pride

reviews.text: to whom it concern
reviews.title: house keeping

reviews.text: We stayed here in May for 2 nights only to visit the souqs and other places worth a visit in Bur area. We stayed in 3BR apartment. Though the apartment building was about 100 meters away in the same complex, it was never too inconvenient to use main hotel facilities.
reviews.title: A pleasant stay

reviews.text: The apartment was nice, clean and spacious with fully equipped kitchen. Beds were fairly comfortable and certainly no qualms about anything.
reviews.title: Very good stay...

reviews.text: I wonder why hotel industry worldwide continues to provide bathtubs when we see a worldwide call to save water for the environment! I see almost 90% hotels putting up a nice little request in bathrooms to reuse towels to save waste of water, then why encourage guests to waste so much water in bathtubs? If the argument is that rarely guests fill the bathtubs these days, we are still on the same side of argument. If most guests take shower standing up in bathtub, it makes more sense converting that space into a lavish-spaced shower cubicle and leave bathtubs to be offered only only in premium category rooms as people looking for absolute luxury generally do not care much about saving environment.
reviews.title: housekeeping

reviews.text: Coming back to this hotel, as for breakfast, the spread was extravagant, local and global foods mingling well.
reviews.title: Excellent Housekeeping

reviews.text: Overall, certainly a nice apartment hotel for those who look for a quick access to Bur Dubai and charms of the old town.
reviews.title: Very nice stay in movenpick bur dubai.

reviews.text: hello fellow travelers,
reviews.title: good location and helpful staff

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for 3 days i think the location is close to many good malls like the dubai mall, diera city center and dolphinatorium.
reviews.title: Good - But not Dubai's best.

reviews.text: The breakfast here is amazing with good English and Indian spread and the staff is excellent friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: More Than I Ever Dreamed

reviews.text: but i really dont think i would rate this as a 5 star property but a 4 star property definetely yes:)
reviews.title: Amazing unforgettable experience

reviews.text: If you are looking for a hotel in the busier, metropolitan area of Dubai (downtown Dubai) near the Dubai Mall and the Burj Khalifa, then look elsewhere. I, however, enjoyed how the Moevenpick Bur Dubai was located about a ten-fifteen minute drive in a cab from the downtown Dubai area with the Burj Khalifa, and set back from the main road. It meant less noise at night, and just a quieter, homelier setting altogether. But don't worry, every single taxi driver in Dubai knows where the hotel is, knows the hotel itself, and can get you there no problem, and it's not inconveniently far away from anything, either. There is a small shopping mart right next to the hotel that is great for small supplies whenever you need them, but if you're running late or have just come back from a busy day out, and can't be bothered to go out to a fancy restaurant for dinner, then I would easily recommend the amazing room service. The hotel offers 24-hour room service, but if you're staying in an apartment off to the side of the complex rather than a hotel room/suite, then the room service takes about half an hour to arrive (45mins if after around 9pm) The tenderloin steak and the grilled chicken from the restaurant default menu are great (definitely worth the price), and for drinks - any alcoholic beverage, or the fruit blend smoothie!
reviews.title: More like four star hotel

reviews.text: I found all of the housekeeping staff to be very helpful and happy in their work.They where happy to insure I had everything needed to make my stay great.Shihab,Saddam and Sinod took time to ansewer my questions and make sure my needs where taken care of.Mynul the supervisor stop in to check as well.It is helpful staff as this that make my choice to return easy.I would hope they are well paid as they are a credit to this hotel.
reviews.title: Housekeeping

reviews.text: This is my 2nd visit and stayed for 5nights.Was given a room on the executive floor but right next door was the staff service pantry and lift area.So it was noisy during the day and throughout could hear the lifts going up and down.Even my room was facing the hotel small couryard and away from the road...the windows did not seem to be insulated as well as the last room i had so there was the constant noise of aircrafts flying overhead.
reviews.title: Not as good as last visit

reviews.text: The shower was really annoying.The water temperature kept on fluctuating between hot and cold to piping hot.Even after adjusting the tap...it was worse.
reviews.title: Blaid's Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was as usual huge and spacious and no complaints in that area.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, but strictly business location

reviews.text: Excellence service and the food was good to. Room service was excellent . Stay was really enjoyable. Ramesh Chinna was my house keeper, Did a excellent job of keeping me in the pleasures and supplies for my stay.
reviews.title: Housekeeping

aka: Moevenpick Hotel And Apartments Bur Dubai
description: Located opposite the American Hospital in Health Care City and only 10 minutes from a host of Key locations in the city; The Dubai Mall and Fountain, Burj Khalifa, DIFC, The World Trade Centre, Dubai International Airport, City Centre, Dubai Port and Dubai Creek, the Moevenpick Hotel and Apartments Bur Dubai is strategically placed for both your business and leisure requirements.
